entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
